sources.title: Swiss Tease ( 1947)
sources.description: A St. Bernard dog with a drinking problem tries to save a mountain climber.

sources.title: Swiss Tease (1947)
sources.description: A St. Bernard dog is dishonorably discharged from the Swiss Alps rescue corps when he samples his brandy and gets drunk. In an effort to make up for his disgrace, he sets out to rescue a skilled mountain climber who needs no help. Slapstick up and down the mountain ensues. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/swiss-tease-1947/

metadata.Plot: A St. Bernard dog is dishonorably discharged from the Swiss Alps rescue corps when he samples his brandy and gets drunk. In an effort to make up for his disgrace, he sets out to rescue a skilled mountain climber who needs no help. Slapstick up and down the mountain ensues.
metadata.Writer: Robert Clampett, Michael Maltese, Tedd Pierce
metadata.Actors: Walter Craig, Cal Howard, Jack Mather
